#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{   int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test!=0)
    {
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int max=0,x[n],y[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>x[i]>>y[i];
    for(int i =0;i<n;i++)
    {       float slope[n-i-1];
            int count=0;
            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
            
                              slope[count++]=((float)(y[j]-y[i])/(float)(x[j]-x[i]));
            
    sort(slope,slope+count);
    int temp_max=1;
			for(int k=0;k<count;k++)
			{
				if(slope[k]==slope[k+1])
				{
					temp_max++;
				}
				else
				{
					if(temp_max >= max)
						max=temp_max;
					temp_max=1;
				}
			}
        }
		cout<<max+1<<endl;
		test--;
    }
        //system("pause");
        return 0;
        }
